CustomField.description:
Indicates if the Moment is eligible as an MQL.
In System Use: 'Moment.MQL_Status'; 'Journey,.Journey_Subtype'; 'Journey.Is_MQL'; Autolaunch: Check MQL'; 'Moment: After Save Automations'
External Systems Utilization: None
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the Moment is eligible as an MQL.
CustomField.label: Is MQL
